text: Henry Wollman Bloch (July 30, 1922 â€“ April 23, 2019) was an American businessman and philanthropist. He was the co-founder and (since 2000) the chairman of the American tax-preparation company H&R; Block. Henry and his brother, Richard Bloch, founded H&R; Block in 1955 in Kansas City, Missouri. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Philanthropists from Missouri Category:Businesspeople from Kansas City, Missouri Category:University of Michigan alumni
title: Henry W. Bloch
